data.name: DefaultSoftwareUpdate
data.value:
Version 2.4.0

Major Features

Organizational Chart Revamp
  • Cleaner UI, Improved UX, Faster
  • View chart by levels
  • Condensed Chart mode
  • Descriptive buttons
  • Search bar improved
  • Moved editing seats to side panel
  • Added Re-centering
Workspace dropdown
  • Set a primary workspace
  • Access any workspace from any page
Tiles
  • Update or add an item to any tile
  • Added personal metrics download
  • To-do list groups by meeting
  • To-dos show a strike-through on completion
  • Revamp the stats tile
  • Added placeholder box on dragging tiles
To-dos/Issues/Headlines
  • Add file at create time
  • Attach to any number of meetings at creation or during editing
  • Removed the 'about' field from headlines
Add or remove V/TO measurables Moved issues show their new meeting Added meeting summary subscriptions Introduced emergency read-only mode

Bugs/Minor Features

Organizational Chart no longer allows invalid data Fixed some L10's not loading until refresh Fixed errors on setting the zoom link Removed double nav-bar from some pages Removed duplicate core values from some people analyzers Removed completed to-dos from meeting summary Fixed tile dragging bug
Version 2.3.1

Major Features

Forward quarterly printouts to your Bloom Growth Guide
  • Send immediately or schedule to be sent on your before your offsite
  • You receive the printout via BCC
Star meetings
  • Most used meetings at the top of your Weekly Meeting listing page
Sticky metrics heading

Bugs/Minor Features

Fixed tile resize bug
Version 2.2.1

Major Features

Quarterly printouts improved layouts
  • Customizable branding and colors
  • Organizational Chart prints on fewer pages
  • Multi-page V/TO printouts look better
  • Recreated the goals printout page
  • Recreated the People Analyzer page
Quarterly Conversation improved
  • Added People Analyzer to the Weekly Meeting
  • Improved layout of Quaterly Conversation
  • Further distingushed expired Quarterly Conversations
  • Quarterly Conversations issued in the background
  • Renaming Quarterly Conversations
  • Includes Goals
Added cross-company goal status page to

Speed Improvements

Dramatic improvments to the speed of the website Meeting summaries send more quickly Page load times improved Creating Quarterly Conversations is now non-blocking Meeting summary is now non-blocking Frequently executed queries optimized

Bugs/Minor Features

Quarterly Conversation
  • Added renaming of Quarterly Conversations
  • Removed duplicate goals from Quarterly Conversation
  • Refresh page on issue Quarterly Conversation
  • Added Quarterly Conversation archive
  • Added Quarterly Conversation archive
  • Removed auto-complete from the issuing Quarterly Conversation
Company goals included in individual goals section on the printout
Version 2.1.1

Major Features

API Version 1 released
  • Access Traction Tools data programatically
  • Add/Edit/Remove Goals, Roles, Measurables, Scores, Todos, Issues
Metrics charts
  • View charted data on the Metrics page of the Weekly Meeting
  • Combine multiple measurables to identify patterns
  • To use, click the chart icon
Alternate invite method when email fails
  • Accessible from the resend invite on the second attempt to send
More Organizational Chart printing options
  • Print sub-trees by clicking the print button on a seat
  • Print organizational chart one department per page
Invoices
  • View new or outstanding invoices
  • Pay outstanding invoices
Company Statistics
  • View statistics about your organization
  • Goals, Todos, Issues, Employees
  • Accessible by admins from the Manage Organization page, on the Advanced tab
Metrics formulas
  • Calculate rows for metrics
  • Combine data from multiple measurables
  • To access, hold the 'shift' key when viewing a metrics and click '(f)'

Bugs/Minor Features

Scorecard numerical truncation Added date and meeting title to Weekly Meeting printout Button added to undo moved issues L10 timers off Headlines now grab notes Banner Todo/Issue/Headlines buttons larger Forgot password link more prominent Weekly Meeting Agenda printout matches meeting ordering for Issues and Todos Issues sortable by create date Notes for Headlines now opens in Archive Shared V/TOs now display titles on Vision page Shared V/TOs now display titles on Traction page Cleaner error pages Add linkable text to the notes panels Fixed accountabilities page bug Goals printout reformatted to match EOS documents Issues' notes no longer run off the page when moving Edit rating now available on the meeting stats page after conclusion Added triple dot indicator below the collapsed organizational chart seat Add divider' puts the divider in a more visible position Deletable phone actions Milestones occasionally showing up on the todo list
Version 2.0.3

Major Experience Changes

Reworked the Edit Meeting page in the "Meeting Manager"
  • Replaced all Weekly Meeting listing buttons with one "Manage" button
  • Moved all dropdown actions into the meeting manager
  • Updated the Add/Create user dialog
  • Added a searchable Add/Create dialog for Measurables and Goals
  • Link measurables/goals from other meetings
  • Must be owned by an attendee
  • Adjusted the Add button, now floats with the screen
  • Moved the Edit Pages into the Meeting Manager
Removed extra menus
  • Eliminated "Admin Settings"
  • Changed "My Settings" => "Edit my profile"
  • Removed "My accountabilities" link
  • Removed "My accountabilities" link
Added Preview meeting
  • Under "Start meeting"
  • No closing todos/headlines/emailing
  • Limited editing
Removed the Meeting Advanced Settings page Reduced some of the editability on the workspace Added autogenerated workspaces for L10s
  • Not editable
Software swaps out personal metrics with Weekly Meeting metrics when user registers (if one is available) Reworked the Manage Organization page
  • Removed the AC, Position, Team, Org tabs
  • Added Core Values, Payments
  • Moved payments out of Advanced into its own tab
  • Special permissions for updating financial info, default is admins

Major Features

Multiple Target markets allowed on VTO Headlines tile on workspace Created beta.traction.tools Users can add Placeholder Users
  • Placeholders are free users
  • Placeholders require no email addres
  • Registering this user removes placeholder status
Speed for Weekly Meeting listing and Meeting Manager dramatically improved

Bugs/Minor Features

Ability to restore goals, headlines, todos, & issues from the Archive Change Personal todo to L10 todo Allowed to set todo owner as "caller" from advanced settings
  • The person creating the todo in Weekly Meeting is supplied in the modal window
Ability to retitle a note Print and export headlines Rock percentage and ratio added to printout Fixed consistance with rock status for exporting Headlines editable from workspace Aggregate Rock completion % on company rocks section and printout Consistancy with to-do due. Fixed a bug with metrics dates being off by one in some timezones Users can be marked as Leadership Team members on account creation Adjusted FAQ for new pages Permissions for updating Payment information (admins by default) Added "Beta" text to login page. Can be interchanged any time Fixed some printing issues with VTO Fixed a create goal from todo bug Exclude the Guarantee and Proven process from printout if they are blank Fixed Export measurable bug when measurable has same name
